Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: One of my favorite place to get Ethiopian food. Everything I chose was good. Meat (chicken, lamb, beef stew) is tender and rich in flavor. The vegetables are also perfectly cooked. Yummy :) ‚Ä¶

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Fantastic food ! Also great vegetarian and vegan options. also loved the home made gingerbeer. And friendly staff.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: An Ethiopian gem of Amsterdam! The owner is the cook, and he is just as friendly as his food is delicious (and it is DELICIOUS). He makes everything himself: the vegan food on the menu, the vegan sugarless desserts (ever heard of an avocado pie?!?) and the drinks. It's a cute place, would definitely recommend it. I'm coming back asap xD

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Lived in Amsterdam all my life, this definitely is a hidden gem of the city. Food is AMAZING, lunch dinner or dessert. And the host (and cook, he can do anything at the same time it seems) is so warm welcoming. You won't regret coming here, if anything you will leave the place already making a reservation for a next time...

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: We ordered takeout and I wasn‚Äôt sure how it would be because of the way Ethiopian food is served but the injera came on the side and it turned out great. They also have all-teff injera which is gluten-free. We got the spicy combination ‚Ä¶

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Finally able to visit Kili and sit down after covid closures. Food is amazing, and there are tons of vegetarian/vegan options one more delicious than the last, meat dishes are also great. The service is always relaxed and amicable just topping the experience. It's an Amsterdam gem!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
We bought take away, food was quiet disssapointing.... All the dishes taste the same..  nothing special about it. The pancakes very acid, but who knows,
maybee that's how they are supposed to taste?

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: 2017: Cosy little home-style Ethiopian takeaway/cafe. Fresh ingredients, perfectly fermented injeras, pretty affordable prices (!) and a very customizable menu. Dishes are flavorful yet light. This place is a True Find (especially for ‚Ä¶

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Absolutely delicious vegan options! Very filling and lovely staff. Highly recommend :)

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: If you are looking for authentic ethiopian food, this is probably not the place. But the service is very good.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Wonderful place! Delicious Ethiopian food, cozy atmosphere and awesome, friendly staff. Nice for either quick takeaway or for casual dining in (they also have another location that's more of a sit-down restaurant). Lots of great vegetarian and vegan options too :) Highly recommended!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: One of the best place to have an awesome Ethiopian food experience in the Netherlands (Amsterdam) with amazing service!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Friendly welcoming staff and great food.  Cafe lovely and warm too on a cold day . Deserts amazing too .

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Sorry guys. I don't understand the good reviews at all. WORST dinner ever! Two plastic TV dinner plates with old overcooked tasteless food for 37 euro. NEVER AGAIN! Hospital food tastes better

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: I am in love ‚ô•Ô∏è a cosy, beautiful place. With AMAZING food. Quite with a spell :)

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Best Ethiopian food! We get the vegetarian deal every time, which is vegan too, and they have great vegan raw raspberry and strawberry cakes! Very nice ambiance inside, also possible to take out or get at thuisbezorgd. I seriously recommend ‚Ä¶

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
Very warm welcome in this cozy place, the food is really great and the quantity is enough even for big eaters. I would 100% recommend this place to anyone :)
Do try the raspberry cake, it's truly amazing!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: The best habesha food ever... Friendly n worm. Can't wait to be back

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: This is not just a takeaway but has tables as well. Absolutely fabulous - really tasty food with amazing vegetable sides. Had the taste buds tingling. A new and great experience - well cooked food with real spice mixes - not the osrt of ‚Ä¶

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Wow, what a great and cosy place with a very interesting and variated choice of ethiopian/pan-african food, many vegan dishes also and I think it's biological. It was raining the day we passed by and luckily we just went in. We got a cup of ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Lovely people, amazing food. So unpretentious and that‚Äôs amazing ! Must try in the neighborhood for casual dinner and take out. Try the homemade ginger beer !

Review Text: Wonderful food, spoiled for choice and great pricing. Very friendly staff too!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Incredible vegetarian food (they do meat as well if you want it), very friendly staff.... Wish I could give it more than 5 stars!!

Review Text: Delicious, extremely friendly spot - the food was great, and also try one of the house-made drinks! Ginger beer and tamarind were fantastic.
